sentences.pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān chī huáng guā.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我把黄瓜切片放在沙拉中，这让沙拉变得非常美味。
sentences.traditionalText: 我把黃瓜切片放在沙拉中，這讓沙拉變得非常美味。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ bǎ huáng guā qiē piàn fàng zài shā lā zhōng, zhè ràng shā lā biàn de fēi cháng měi wèi.
sentences.translation: I slice the cucumber and put it in the salad, which makes the salad very delicious.
